void TestAssert (  int  c,
const char *  testname,
const char *  msg,
int *  failed
) 
 

If c is false, generate a message and set the global success flag to false.

Parameters:
c expression returning true (non-zero) or false (zero)
testname name of test being run, printed with message
msg message to print if expression returns false
failed set to non-zero if test fails

void TestMemory (  MemoryCheck_t *  memCheck,
const char *  testname,
int *  success
) 
 

Check that current allocations match snapshot.

Parameters:
memCheck pointer to structure previously filled with InitMemoryCheck()
testname name of the test being run, printed with message on failure
success set if snapshot doesn't match current values
